textBox.richText: And I've never seen anyone quite like you before No, I've never met anyone quite like you before Thoughts from above hit the people down below People in this world, we have no place to go Oh, it's the last time So today I was just piddlin’ around, checking all my Social Networking sites when I stumbled upon a Twitter post (i.e., tweet) by Jukebox The Ghost requesting school submissions for them to come play there. I complied with said request, and was presented with some songs. One being a cover of the song whose lyrics (a portion of) lie above. It’s also a bit odd when you “discover” a new song and you first hear it as a cover. It feels almost as if you are unworthy; you haven’t paid your respects, so to speak, to the original song. But too bad. I like Jukebox The Ghost’s cover of Temptation without needing to hear the original band who hails from the United Kingdom singing it. Edit: I decided to go back and post the song to compliment the post because the song is just “sooo coool.” So go rawk out or whatever.
